DESCRIPTION: Adds in commands that *moderate* the exiting users.
NAME: Dismissal
INSTALL_MSG: `[p]exitset` is the command for this one. This works the exact same way as the *welcome* cog (Provided by the community repository, **which** was provided by irdumb#1229), but instead, it tells you whe people leave instead of join!
